lst.title: Medical Services
lst.define: Our facility has state-of-the-art equipment and technology

lst.title: Surgical Services
lst.define: We offer a full range of surgical procedures including orthopedics and emergency surgeries.

lst.title: Dental Care
lst.define: A dental exam can determine whether your pet needs preventative dental care such as scaling and polishing.

lst.title: House Calls
lst.define: The elderly, physically challenged, and multiple pet households often find our in-home veterinary service helpful and convenient.

lst.title: Emergencies
lst.define: You can reach us at any time. At least one of our doctors is on call every day and night.
